contents.text: Welcome to Panoply, your San Francisco-based AI-powered cloud data warehouse that automates data collection, modeling, and scaling.
If you are an existing customer needing technical assistance, please press 1.
For help with data integration and connectors, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an integration specialist.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot and configure a new Salesforce data connector in my Panoply account
I need to connect our legacy mission logs database to Panoply and configure the integration.
I need help configuring a custom data connector for ingesting Salesforce events into Panoply.
I’d like help linking my customer data from Excel into Panoply.
I need help connecting my lab’s PostgreSQL database to Panoply to import experiment results.

contents.text: For assistance with performance tuning or scaling, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a performance tuning expert.

navigationGoals: Optimize query performance and scale up my warehouse to handle increased analytics workloads
I'm looking to tune my warehouse's performance to handle increasing data from training operations.
I’d like guidance on tuning resource allocation to optimize query performance on my large datasets.
My reports are running very slowly; I need someone to help speed up performance.
I need guidance on optimizing Panoply to handle large-scale physics simulation datasets efficiently.

contents.text: If you are interested in sales or new account inquiries, please press 2.
For information on pricing and packages, press 1.
One of our sales consultants will be with you shortly to discuss pricing options.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing and package options for a 20TB cloud data warehouse
I want to review your pricing plans and see if there’s a nonprofit or veteran rate.
I’m looking for detailed pricing info on your enterprise plan with unlimited API calls and data retention.
Can you explain the monthly cost and package options for your service?
I’d like detailed pricing and package options to see if Panoply fits my student research budget.

contents.text: To schedule a personalized demo of our AI data warehouse, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to an AI solutions specialist for your demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized demo of Panoply’s AI-powered data automation features
I'd like to book a tailored demo of your AI analytics for my veteran service organization.
I want to schedule a personalized demo focusing on your AI-driven data modeling features.
I’d like to schedule a personalized walkthrough of your AI data warehouse.
I want to book a personalized demo of Panoply’s AI-driven data modeling features for my thesis.
